ygData.subject: Re: Barbarians, I state fact.
ygData.msgSnippet: Steve, You state the by definition of course, I am Barbaric.  However you fail to take one thing into account..... In the mystical land of Norrath, all races
ygData.messageBody:
Steve,

You state the by definition of course, I am "Barbaric." However you fail to
take one thing into account.....

In the mystical land of Norrath, all races are mystically controlled by the
all-powerful Earthlings...... So then, all of the negative aspects of my
"Barbaric" heritage are overcome by my mighty Earthling controller, me.

That leaves me with the superior physical conditioning of my race, the hardy
Barbarians. Also, with the power of the Shaman, a lost art that you newer
races may not even learn. Long ago, we determined to hide these secrets
from the younger races.

I pity you, with your frail body. You spend all your energies on matters of
the mind, yet never fully coming to know the powers of nature around you.
You may blast an opponent with mighty force, but what are you to do once
your manna is spent? Will you die, or run? And if you run, will you have
the Spirit of the Wolf to speed you? No, you won't. I dare say that no
creature on all of Norrath can keep up with me. I can both grind an enemy
to a halt, and run at speeds the fastest leopard envies. If I run at all,
for my mighty staff can damage an opponent nearly as well as my magics can.

Barbarian Shaman
